Html:
This project is really REALLY helpful, yet there are rooms for improvements.

I've forked the project to github, https://github.com/JsonCSharpClassGenerator/JsonCSharpClassGenerator/, and have made it my first priority to consolidate all 18 Forks listed on the https://jsonclassgenerator.codeplex.com/ to the github repo. See --
https://github.com/JsonCSharpClassGenerator/JsonCSharpClassGenerator/projects/1

Meanwhile, any one has unpublished or interesting enhancements, please chip in at https://github.com/JsonCSharpClassGenerator/JsonCSharpClassGenerator

Thanks
